item.description:
Voilà l’été! Toujours l’été!
Samedi le 18 juillet 2009, venez fêter l’été à Newport et en même temps célébrer la prise de la Bastille le 14 juillet 1789 avec le Providence French Conversation et le Newport French Conversation MeetUp Groups.
We’re celebrating summer in Newport on Saturday 18 July 2009 and also using this moment to remember the storming of the French Bastille on 14 July 1789 and Newport’s friendship with the French Nation. Newport was home to the French fleet and army who arrived to assist General Washington and the Patriots in their revolutionary war for independence from the British. Almost 6,000 Frenchmen landed in Newport under the command of General Comte de Rochambeau in 1780, a great moment for French-American friendship.
What/Que se passera? Une soirée du pain, du vin et du Boursin – et la pétanque !
When/Quand? 6pm Saturday 18 July 2009 / 18hrs samedi 18 juillet 2009
Where/Où? John’s place/ chez John, 2 Eustis Street, Newport RI 02840 (401) 848-4506
Bring/ Qu’apporter? French fare and drinks/ quelque chose a manger et boire a la française…! *
Drinks - Wine, beer or soft drink
Food - baguette, salami or cheese
* Please indicate in your RSVP what you’ll be bringing to minimize double-ups… Merci!
Et RSVP toute de suite!
See you at John’s place!

Stevie, Ray, Elizabeth & John

group.name: The Providence French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Voilà l’été! Toujours l’été!
